monq.jfa.actions

Class DefaultAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • monq.jfa.actions.DefaultAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FaAction

    public class DefaultAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements FaAction
    provides an action that always returns the other action from mergeWith(monq.jfa.FaAction). The intention is that this never survives in a DFA compilation. Should it do nevertheless, the default action is called in case this is called.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultAction

        public DefaultAction(FaAction dflt)

    • Method Detail

      • nullInstance

        public static DefaultAction nullInstance()
        returns an instance with no default. It should only be used to implement operations on automata. If this action is hit during operation of an automaton, it will result in an NullPointerException.

      • invoke

        public void invoke(java.lang.StringBuilder yytext,
          int start,
          DfaRun runner)
            throws CallbackException
        Description copied from interface: FaAction

        is called by methods of DfaRun in case of a match. Parameter yytext contains the matching text from position start onwards. The callback may change the whole of yytext, but the under most circumstances, only the matching text should be changed. Parameter runner is the DfaRun object which called this function. Of interest are its fields DfaRun.clientData and DfaRun.collect.

        Specified by:
        invoke in interface FaAction
        Throws:
        CallbackException

      • mergeWith

        public FaAction mergeWith(FaAction other)
        always returns other.
        Specified by:
        mergeWith in interface FaAction
        Parameters:
        other - will never be null.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
